page.title: 12Leisure activities.
page.content: These fall into two categories 1.Those specifically for people residing in the district. 2.Those involving people from outside the district. For youngsters the first category contains all the usual organisations; Cubs, Scouts, Brownies, Guides,Church Lads & Girls Brigade, Boys Brigade, Red Cross,as well as a wide variety of sports clubs. These are all extra to any curricular or extra curricular activities that may be organised by the local schools. In addition to those already mentioned,each year during the Summer vacation,a group of adults organise a one week Summer School activity for those under eleven.During the week the children can join in a mixture of practical exercises.
